description: Completed B.Tech in Computer Science with hands-on experience across programming, databases, algorithms, and full-stack development. Participated in multiple academic projects and technical activities.
Completed senior secondary education with a specialization in Computer Science, including programming fundamentals and mathematics.
Completed high school education with a focus on mathematics, logical reasoning, and computer science foundation.
Studied from class 1 to class 8, developed strong academic fundamentals and participated in curricular and co-curricular activities.
